00023 class TimeTrack: public Track {

00026 
00027    TimeTrack(DirManager * projDirManager);

00029

00031 
00032    // Identifying the type of track
00033    virtual int GetKind() const { return Time; } 
00034 
00035    // TimeTrack parameters
00036 
00037    virtual double GetOffset() { return 0.0; };
00038    virtual void SetOffset(double /* t */) {};
00039 
00040    virtual double GetStartTime() { return 0.0; };
00041    virtual double GetEndTime() { return 0.0; };

00046

00048    virtual XMLTagHandler *HandleXMLChild(const wxChar *tag);
00049    virtual void WriteXML(XMLWriter &xmlFile);
00050 
00051    // Lock and unlock the track: you must lock the track before
00052    // doing a copy and paste between projects.
00053 
00054    bool Lock();
00055    bool Unlock();
00056 
00057    // Access the track's speed envelope
00058 
00059    Envelope *GetEnvelope() { return mEnvelope; }
00060 
00061    // Get/Set the speed-warping range, as percentage of original speed (e.g. 90%-110%)
00062 
00063    long GetRangeLower() { return mRangeLower ? mRangeLower : 1; }
00064    long GetRangeUpper() { return mRangeUpper ? mRangeUpper : 1; }
00065 
00066    void SetRangeLower(long lower) { mRangeLower = lower; }
00067    void SetRangeUpper(long upper) { mRangeUpper = upper; }
00068 
00069    double warp( double t );
00070 
00071    void testMe();
00072

00078
